column1: Little Goat Diner////This place is absolutely incredible! The flavors of every dish that I had was fantastic. First time coming last night. I tried their special sesame sweet cream latte
column2: very delish. Also tried the pork belly pancake
column4: goat chili & pork belly fries with cheese sauce on the side. Everything was great. Highly recommend and reasonably prices. Our server was perfect
column5: don't remember his name but great staff!
